content:
Diagnosis:		Cervical cancer - adenosquamous carcinoma

Stage:		FIGO Stage IB1

Histology:		Moderately differentiated adenosquamous carcinoma
		HPV 18 positive, p16 positive
		Lymphovascular invasion absent

Investigations:	MRI pelvis 12 Apr 2024 - 2.8cm cervical mass confined to cervix
		CT chest/abdomen/pelvis 15 Apr 2024 - no evidence of metastatic disease
		PET-CT 20 Apr 2024 - FDG avid cervical primary, no nodal or distant disease

Current Status:	Newly diagnosed, for radical chemoradiotherapy

[redacted name] is a 42-year-old lady who was referred following abnormal cervical screening and subsequent diagnosis of cervical cancer. She underwent examination under anaesthesia on 5 Apr 2024 which confirmed a 2.8cm exophytic lesion confined to the cervix. She is currently well with minimal vaginal discharge and no bleeding. No significant past medical history.

I have discussed treatment options with [redacted name] today. Given the stage and histology, I have recommended radical chemoradiotherapy with external beam radiotherapy and concurrent weekly cisplatin, followed by brachytherapy. She understands the aims of treatment and potential side effects. We will proceed with radiotherapy planning next week with aim to commence treatment in 2 weeks time. She will be reviewed weekly during treatment in the on-treatment review clinic.

primary_cancer.histopathology_status: Moderately differentiated adenosquamous carcinoma, lymphovascular invasion absent

cancer_timeline.value: Examination under anaesthesia confirming 2.8cm exophytic cervical lesion confined to cervix
MRI pelvis shows 2.8cm cervical mass confined to cervix
CT chest/abdomen/pelvis shows no evidence of metastatic disease
PET-CT shows FDG avid cervical primary with no nodal or distant disease

status_updates.value: Newly diagnosed stage IB1 cervical adenosquamous carcinoma. Initial assessment for radical chemoradiotherapy.
Plan for radical chemoradiotherapy with external beam radiotherapy and concurrent weekly cisplatin, followed by brachytherapy
Weekly review during treatment in on-treatment review clinic
